summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 20185 entitled: "An ordinance providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary to preserve from pollution the water supplied to the inhabitants of the City of Seattle, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged for said purpose", approved February 18, 1909, and authorizing the dismissal of the action in Superior Court based upon said ordinance and providing for the payment of all taxable costs in said action.
